scripts.preinstall: node -e "if (!/pnpm/.test(process.env.npm_execpath||'') && !/pnpm/.test(process.env.npm_config_user_agent||'')) { console.error('This repository uses PNPM. Please run: pnpm install'); process.exit(1) }"
scripts.cache:warmup: cd codex-rs && cargo check --all-features && pnpm run cache:stats
scripts.ci:format: scripts/run-cargo-ci.sh bash -c 'cd codex-rs && cargo fmt -- --config imports_granularity=Item --check'
scripts.ci:clippy: scripts/run-cargo-ci.sh bash -c 'cd codex-rs && CARGO_PROFILE_DEV_DEBUG=0 cargo clippy --all-features --tests --profile dev -- -D warnings'
scripts.ci:test: scripts/run-cargo-ci.sh bash -c 'cd codex-rs && cargo nextest run --profile ci-test --fail-fast || cargo test --profile ci-test'
scripts.ci:test:fallback: scripts/run-cargo-ci.sh bash -c 'cd codex-rs && cargo test --lib --bins --tests --profile ci-test'
scripts.ci:test:fast: scripts/run-cargo-ci.sh bash -c 'cd codex-rs && cargo test --lib --bins --tests --profile test-cache -- --nocapture'
scripts.ci:test:deps: scripts/run-cargo-ci.sh bash -c 'cd codex-rs && cargo check --all-targets --profile test-cache'
scripts.ci:prebuild: scripts/run-cargo-ci.sh bash -c 'cd codex-rs && cargo check --profile test-cache && cargo check --tests --profile test-cache'
scripts.ci:checks: concurrently -n format,spell,mcp,shear "pnpm run ci:format" "pnpm run ci:codespell" "pnpm run ci:mcp-types" "pnpm run ci:shear"
scripts.ci:verify: concurrently -n clippy,test "pnpm run ci:clippy" "pnpm run ci:test:fast"
scripts.ci: pnpm run ci:prebuild && pnpm run ci:checks && pnpm run ci:verify
scripts.ci:fast: pnpm run ci:prebuild && concurrently -n checks,verify "pnpm run ci:checks" "pnpm run ci:verify"
